shortdesc.ph: Sets the dual-stream mode on the sender side and the low-quality video stream.

p.codeblock: public abstract int enableDualStreamMode(boolean enabled, SimulcastStreamConfig streamConfig);
virtual int enableDualStreamMode(bool enabled, const SimulcastStreamConfig& streamConfig) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int EnableDualStreamMode(bool enabled, const FSimulcastStreamConfig& streamConfig);
public abstract int EnableDualStreamMode(bool enabled, SimulcastStreamConfig streamConfig);
Future<void> enableDualStreamMode( {required bool enabled, SimulcastStreamConfig? streamConfig});

section.props: native unreal bp flutter unity electron rn cs

pd.p:
Whether to enable dual-stream mode:
: Enable dual-stream mode.
: (Default) Disable dual-stream mode.
The configuration of the low-quality video stream. See . When setting mode to , setting streamConfig will not take effect.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
